# sapkgs/skimapp

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of the `skimapp` in this branch is to provide a `skim` of a given dataset found in the `datasets` package.

## Installation

You can install the development version of skimap like so:

``` r
install.packages('remotes')
remotes::install_github('mjfrigaard/sapkgs')
```

```{r example, eval=FALSE}
library(skimapp)
skimapp::skimVarApp()
```
